mapper.update:
update plant_seed_inner_order
order_number = #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
seed_id = #{seedId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
block_id = #{blockId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
plant_count = #{plantCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
plant_amount = #{plantAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
plant_profit = #{plantProfit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
plant_state = #{plantState,jdbcType=BIT},
plant_time = #{plantTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update plant_seed_inner_order set order_number = #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seed_id = #{seedId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, block_id = #{blockId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, plant_count = #{plantCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, plant_amount = #{plantAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, plant_profit = #{plantProfit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, plant_state = #{plantState,jdbcType=BIT}, plant_time = #{plantTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select t1.seed_id,t2.name as seed_name,sum(t1.plant_count) as order_count,t1.plant_time as order_time from plant_seed_inner_order t1 left join plant_seed t2 on t1.seed_id = t2.id group by seed_id
